introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is とこや, which you will often hear in situations where people are discussing grooming services, haircuts, or planning a visit to get a trim.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "とこや" refers to a barbershop. It means a place where people, often men, go to get a haircut, shave, or other grooming services. This word typically emphasizes the traditional aspect of a barbershop setting, with services often tailored towards men.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 美容院 : びよういん : beauty parlour
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word "とこや" is "びよういん." While "とこや" specifically refers to a traditional barbershop geared mainly towards men's grooming services, "びよういん" is a beauty salon that offers various hair and grooming services for both men and women.
antonyms: 自宅 : じたく : one's home
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word "とこや" is "じたく." While "とこや" indicates a commercial place where you get haircuts and grooming services, "じたく" refers to your home. They differ because one is a public service location, and the other is a private setting.

collocations.kanji: とこやのけいけんしゃ
collocations.furigana: とこやのけいけんしゃ

example_sentences.kanji: あたらしい床屋に行きます。
example_sentences.furigana: あたらしい床屋(とこや)に行(い)きます。

translations.EN: I will go to the new barber shop.
translations.ID: Saya akan pergi ke tukang cukur baru.
translations.ES: Voy a ir a la nueva barbería.
translations.VI: Tôi sẽ đến cửa hàng cắt tóc mới.
translations.FR: Je vais chez le nouveau barbier.
translations.MY: သစ်ကားဆုံးချစ်အိပ်ဝင်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मैं नए नाई की दुकान पर जाऊँगा।

example_sentences.furigana: 明日(あした)は床屋(とこや)に行(い)く。

translations.EN: I will go to the barbershop tomorrow.
translations.ID: Besok saya akan pergi ke tukang cukur.
translations.VI: Tôi sẽ đi đến tiệm cắt tóc vào ngày mai.
translations.FR: Je vais aller chez le coiffeur demain.
translations.MY: မနက်ဖြန်အဝတ်ရွှေမှာ ကပ်တိုင်သွားပါမယ်။
translations.HI: कल मैं नाई के पास जाऊंगा।

example_sentences.kanji: 床屋の美容師は親切です。
example_sentences.furigana: 床屋(とこや)の美容師(びようし)は親切(しんせつ)です。

translations.ID: Tukang pangkas rambut itu baik hati.
translations.VI: Thợ cắt tóc rất tốt bụng.
translations.MY: ဆံပင်ညှပ်သူသည် ကျင့်စားရင့်ရွက်သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 床屋のコースに行きました。
example_sentences.furigana: 床屋(とこや)のコースに行(い)きました。

translations.EN: I went to the barber's course.
translations.ID: Saya pergi ke kursus tukang cukur.
translations.ES: Fui al curso de la barbería.
translations.VI: Tôi đã đi đến khóa học của tiệm cắt tóc.
translations.FR: Je suis allé au cours du barbier.
translations.TL: Pumunta ako sa kurso ng barbero.
translations.HI: मैं नाई के कार्यशाला में गया।

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は床屋の経験者です。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は床屋(とこや)の経験者(けいけんしゃ)です。

translations.ID: Dia adalah seorang tukang cukur berpengalaman.
translations.VI: Anh ấy là thợ cắt tóc có kinh nghiệm.
translations.ZH: 他是一位有经验的理发师。
translations.MY: သူသည် လိပ်ပြာတစ်ယောက်ဖြစ်သည်။
translations.FA: او یک آرایشگر با تجربه است.

barbershop.MY: ဆံပင်ညှပ်ဆိုင်
